title.en: Let Me Spoil you! His passionate lovemaking is turning my world upside down!

altTitles.ja: 甘えていいよ、満たすから。〜本音のHで乱される夜〜（単話）

description.en: “Please don’t hold back, go completely crazy!” I never knew sex could feel this good! At her office job, Kaede is like everyone's reliable older sister. And currently her love life isn’t going that well, so she isn’t seeing anyone right now. But then Okitsu, the most popular guy in the office, finds out her secret and declares to the whole office that she and him are dating! She wasn’t very fond of the flirty Okitsu at first but talking to him brings a certain peace and calm to her stormy heart. He is both gentle and rough and she is completely defenseless against his sweet words. His warm embrace seems to envelop her completely... Is she feeling this way only because his fingers work their magic deep inside her? Or is she really falling for him?
